snippet.title: PETER FITZSIMONS SHOULD HAVE MORE RESPECT FOR TRUTH
snippet.content:
Peter FitzSimons is another exemplar of the Left's chronic weakness - to defend a side rather than a principle. In this case he defends Julia Baird's deeply deceiving attack on Christianity.
I hope his own books have more respect for research and truth.
